instruction: Nintendo is a manufacturer of video game consoles and accessories, as well as a developer and publisher of video games. It was founded by Hiroshi Yamauchi in 1889 and is headquartered in Kyoto, Japan. The company is publicly traded on the Tokyo Stock Exchange and has several subsidiaries, including Nintendo Co., Ltd. and Nintendo of America, Inc. Its chief executive officer is Shuntaro Furukawa. Nintendo's brand is known for its iconic characters such as Mario, Zelda, and Pikmin. The company's business division includes hardware, software, and services, with a focus on gaming and entertainment. Nintendo's position in the industry is one of the largest and most influential in the world of video games.
